articles.title: Sources -- Fox, ESPN to open talks with Big 12 about conference's next television deal
articles.description: Fox and ESPN have agreed to engage in discussions with the Big 12 about the league's next television contract, sources told ESPN. The planned talks come more than a year and a half before the contract calls for a formal negotiating window.
articles.content:
Fox and ESPN have agreed to engage in discussions with the Big 12 about the league's next television contract, sources told ESPN.

articles.title: Detroit Lions release QB David Blough, set to sign Nate Sudfeld as Jared Goff's backup, source says
articles.description: The Lions have released quarterback David Blough and are expected to sign Nate Sudfeld to serve as Jared Goff's backup, a source told ESPN.
articles.content:

articles.title: Barcelona's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang suffers broken jaw during robbery - sources
articles.description: Barcelona striker Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang suffered a broken jaw during a robbery at his house earlier in the week, sources confirmed to ESPN.
articles.content:
